data.title: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees – Nobel Symposia
data.meta_description: The Nobel Peace Prize 1954 was awarded to Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) "for its efforts to heal the wounds of war by providing help and protection to refugees all over the world"
data.text:
Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees

Nobel Symposia

Speech

Your browser does not support the video tag.

At the Nobel Centennial Symposia, held on 6 December 2001 in Oslo, Norway, Ruud Lubbers, High Commissioner, Office of the UNHCR, gave this speech.
